pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides utility called Adminer for database management in a single PHP file, and utiliry called Adminer Editor for data manipulation for end-users.

use.flag: Plugin. Enable auto-detection and inclusion of adminer.js, like adminer.css
Plugin. Hide some databases from the interface - just to improve design, not a security plugin
Plugin. Exports one database so that it can be synced with other database
Plugin. Include current date and time in export filename
Plugin. Display jQuery UI Timepicker for each date and datetime field
Plugin. Select foreign key in edit form
Plugin. Use textarea for char and varchar
Plugin. Get e-mail subject and message from database (Adminer Editor)
Plugin. Use select-option for enum edit instead of regular input text on enum type in PostgreSQL
Plugin. Edit fields ending with _path by input type="file" and link to the uploaded files from select
Plugin. Link system tables (in mysql and information_schema databases) by foreign keys
Plugin. Allow using Adminer inside a frame
Plugin. Import SQL files from a directory
Plugin. Display JSON values as table in edit
Plugin. Enables use of saved credentials for accessing a database
Plugin. Check IP address and allow empty password
Plugin. Require One Time Password at login
Plugin. Display constant list of servers in login form
Plugin. Connect to MySQL using SSL
Plugin. Authenticate a user from the login table
Plugin. Execute writes on master and reads on slave
Enable the PHP Data Objects extension
Pretty print JSON values in edit
Plugin. Prefill field containing _slug with slugified value of a previous field (JavaScript)
Plugin. Log all queries to SQL file
Plugin. Show comments of sql structure in more places (mainly where you edit things)
Plugin. Expanded table indexes structure output
Plugin. Filter names in tables list
Plugin. Edit all fields containing _html by HTML editor TinyMCE and display the HTML in select
Plugin. Translate all table and field comments, enum and set values from the translation table
Plugin. Edit all fields containing _html by HTML editor WYMeditor and display the HTML in select
